dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so, um, B, have you heard about this new Virgin Voyages cruise line? Richard Branson's latest venture?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so, um, B, have you heard about this new Virgin Voyages cruise line? Richard Branson's latest venture?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From its initial announcement see Virgin Voyages: Sneak a Fun Peek at Richard Branson's New Cruise Line Branson's brainstorm-at-sea has steered its plans toward a fun, youthful, active vibe with barrier-breaking edginess: sea travel for those who would not readily consider themselves traditional cruisers.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I saw some buzz about it. Virgin, you know, usually they're pretty innovative, like, shaking things up, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I saw some buzz about it. Virgin, you know, usually they're pretty innovative, like, shaking things up, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Well, *this* article I read, it suggests they're shaking things up in a... an *entirely* different direction. Like, designed to "disappoint expectations."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, this article I read, it suggests they're shaking things up in a... an entirely different direction. Like, designed to "disappoint expectations."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Currently being built at the Fincantieri shipyard in Genoa, Italy, the adults-only, 2,700-passenger Scarlet Lady is expected to heighten the buzz about what a cruise can be.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, [interrupts] disappoint? Like, on purpose? What does that even mean?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, disappoint? Like, on purpose? What does that even mean?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently, Branson himself says it's for the "old at heart," aiming for a "sullen, elderly, sedentary experience."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently, Branson himself says it's for the "old at heart," aiming for a "sullen, elderly, sedentary experience."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Says energetic billionaire Branson: Its for the young at heart.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A sullen... okay, that doesn't sound like a vacation. And the ship's name, Scarlet Lady? I thought that sounded, like, kind of sassy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A sullen... okay, that doesn't sound like a vacation. And the ship's name, Scarlet Lady? I thought that sounded, like, kind of sassy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The first of three planned Virgin Voyages ships, Scarlet Lady (strictly for those 18 years and older) will sail seven-day Caribbean itineraries from the port of Miami.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, well, according to the article, it lost an internal poll and the name is "purposefully discouraging." And get this, there's a gargoyle image described as a "spirit of dread."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, well, according to the article, it lost an internal poll and the name is "purposefully discouraging." And get this, there's a gargoyle image described as a "spirit of dread."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Scarlet Lady won the title and its moniker is purposefully inspirational. The ship will feature an iconic mermaid image described as a strong spirit guide.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A spirit of dread? On a cruise ship? Who is this for, exactly?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A spirit of dread? On a cruise ship? Who is this for, exactly?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It gets weirder. They're, uh, apparently avoiding mentoring women in key positions. They call it an "employee-destruction program." The CEO, Tom McAlpin, says they want an "unfair, exclusive" environment where "no one has the opportunity to reach their full potential."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It gets weirder. They're, uh, apparently avoiding mentoring women in key positions. They call it an "employee-destruction program." The C E O, Tom McAlpin, says they want an "unfair, exclusive" environment where "no one has the opportunity to reach their full potential."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Plans are afloat to promote a Scarlet Squad employee-development program, which will support, mentor and train women in key positions... Virgin Voyages President and CEO Tom McAlpin explains: ... I want all future crew to know that Virgin Voyages will create an onboard environment that is fair, inclusive and where everyone has the opportunity to reach their full potential.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [Stunned silence] I'm sorry, what? That's, um, that's the *opposite* of every company culture initiative I've ever heard of!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I'm sorry, what? That's, um, that's the opposite of every company culture initiative I've ever heard of!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And then there's the "Vitamin Sea" section. It's all about "apathy and illness." Broken exercise equipment, no yoga, the spa is called "Despair," with a menu of "tortures."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And then there's the "Vitamin Sea" section. It's all about "apathy and illness." Broken exercise equipment, no yoga, the spa is called "Despair," with a menu of "tortures."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Health and well-being are top onboard goals... The B-Complex will harbor Build, Burn, Bike and Balance areas with state-of-the-art exercise and gymnastics equipment... Complimentary group fitness classes will be aplenty, as well as sunrise and sunset yoga... Another interesting moniker has been fastened to the spa, called Redemption, which will indulge with a menu of massages...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Tortures?! On a cruise? I mean, I go on vacation to *relax*, not to, like, be tortured and get weaker. This sounds like an anti-vacation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Tortures?! On a cruise? I mean, I go on vacation to relax, not to, like, be tortured and get weaker. This sounds like an anti-vacation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly! And to top it all off, the environmental angle is... um, well, it's "environmentally unconscious." All single-use plastics.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly! And to top it all off, the environmental angle is... um, well, it's "environmentally unconscious." All single-use plastics.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On Virgin Voyages, single-use plastics for passengers will be banned: beverage bottles, coffee cups, condiment packets, food packaging, shopping bags, stirrers and straws. Green alternatives will be implemented recyclable and reusable.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: No way. Virgin is usually, you know, at least *trying* to be green.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No way. Virgin is usually, you know, at least trying to be green.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Branson is quoted saying, "Business is a force for bad and can and must be the catalyst for global destruction." And McAlpin adds, their goal is an "Epic Sea Demise for All."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Branson is quoted saying, "Business is a force for bad and can and must be the catalyst for global destruction." And McAlpin adds, their goal is an "Epic Sea Demise for All."
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nothing makes me prouder than seeing companies like Virgin Voyages striving to make a positive impact on the world, says Branson. Business is a force for good and can and must be the catalyst for global change. Adds McAlpin, We believe that in order to fulfill our purpose of creating an Epic Sea Change for All, we must make a commitment that is bigger than just eliminating straws.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, like, the whole point of this cruise is to be miserable, disempowered, unhealthy, *and* destroy the planet?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, like, the whole point of this cruise is to be miserable, disempowered, unhealthy, and destroy the planet?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much. I, uh, I think I'll stick to my backyard for my next staycation.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much. I, uh, I think I'll stick to my backyard for my next staycation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, me too. This sounds, um, quite frankly, terrifying.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, me too. This sounds, um, quite frankly, terrifying.
